Events that occurred on 9 October.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1937 - Actor Brian Blessed is born.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 102a.
1950 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 130a.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 141.
1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 218.
1964 - Film director Guillermo del Toro is born.
1968 - Video-game writer Franti≈°ek Fuka is born.
1979 - The Jackanory episode "Inside Information" is aired on the BBC.
1982 - The thirteenth - and final - episode of the new version of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at the Auditorium Theatre in Chicago, Illinois.
2010 - Chilean Tolkien Society's Mereth Oronnad.
2014 - The Adventures of Tom Bombadil (expanded edition) is published.
2017 - Filming began on Tolkien (film), directed by Dome Karukoski and written by David Gleeson.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
With Frodo severely wounded, Strider and the four hobbits travel slowly towards Rivendell.
Glorfindel and other High Elves leave Rivendell in search of the Ring-bearer.
Gandalf hurries towards Rivendell after the Black Riders attacked him on Weathertop.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
